content.body: This is the interaction between dynamic import and event loop that I mentioned yesterday: https://github.com/web-platform-tests/wpt/pull/35949
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: This is the interaction between dynamic import and event loop that I mentioned yesterday: https://github.com/web-platform-tests/wpt/pull/35949

content.body:
> <@nicolo-ribaudo:matrix.org> I tried writing a rudimental bundler using Layer 0, Module Blocks and Import Reflection: https://gist.github.com/nicolo-ribaudo/81f18db096659ac8447ca94f50f2c37a

could you have used `ModuleSource` constructor instead of the module block here?
